title: [K-12] Qualitative Research-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Strengthening IDT Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and office management experience
context.additional_context: A process integrating IDT core competencies and research methodologies to strengthen practical science skills.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the six core IDT (Instructional Design Technology) competencies—analysis, design, development, evaluation, management, and research—when designing science education content.
Learners can diagnose practical problems and derive educational requirements by utilizing qualitative research methodologies (interview techniques).
Learners can produce project-based assessment deliverables in the field of science using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
